full_description:
XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS Smart Watch

The XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS Smart Watch is a cutting-edge wearable that blends a stylish appearance with advanced functions. Its main feature is a big 1.96-inch high-definition touch screen with sharp pictures and an expanded interface that improves user engagement and reading. Despite its huge display, the watch has an ultra-thin casing, ensuring a modern and attractive appearance on your wrist. The XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS is waterproof up to IP68 standards, making it both durable and versatile. This means that it is not only splash and weather resistant, but it can also be immersed in water up to 1.5 meters deep for 30 minutes, making it perfect for swimmers and water sports enthusiasts. One of the main benefits of this COBEE C1 PLUS smart watch is its efficient charging method and lengthy standby time. With its rapid charging time, you can quickly power up the gadget, and once charged, it has a prolonged standby duration, lowering the frequency of charging and letting you to use it for longer periods of time without interruption. The XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS has configurable audio settings, so you may change the call volume and media volume individually to suit your needs. Whether you're having a call, listening to music, or viewing a video, you can customize the sound output to fit your surroundings and tastes. For enjoyment and relaxation, the COBEE C1 PLUS watch has built-in activities that provide an enjoyable distraction. These games may be played at any time and from any location, making them an ideal way to relax and pass the time. Staying connected is made simple with the Smart Sync Notification function. This function keeps you up to speed with notifications from your smartphone, such as calls, texts, and app alerts, right on your wrist. You can simply monitor incoming calls and read messages without having to reach for your phone, allowing you to stay connected even when on the road. Fitness aficionados will like the XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS's extensive sports tracking features. With over 100 sports modes to select from, the COBEE C1 PLUS watch can precisely record a wide range of physical activities, including running and cycling. It also has a sophisticated sensor that offers exact data, allowing you to accurately measure your steps, calories burnt, distance traveled, and heart rate. The XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS Smart Watch has a large high-definition touch screen, an IP68 waterproof rating, efficient charging with a long standby time, customizable audio settings, built-in games, smart notifications, extensive fitness tracking features, and an ultra-thin case with an advanced sensor. The XINJI COBEE C1 PLUS, with its combination of design, durability, and usefulness, is a flexible and dependable companion for daily usage and busy lives.

The XINJI COBEE C1 Waterproof Smart Watch comes with a 1.69 inch TFT HD (240x280) Capacitor Full Contact Touch Screen display with 500 nits brightness. The fitness tracker comes with 3ATM professional waterproof, with super waterproof performance (can't be in hot water). The XINJI COBEE C2 features smart notifications. Receive emails, texts, and alerts right on your watch when paired with a compatible smartphone. You can even respond to texts if you have an Android phone. The XINJI COBEE C2 comes with a 1-year warranty.
